nodes.bodyText: This all seems weird, we're giving the lumberjck a free fungi if we can't find one?
I may have misunderstood you yesterday. I thought he should be given one out of the blue. I can revert this if this is not intended.
Yeah, we don't need this. In the next step (part (c) of what I had written you) when we take down the nether wart, we can add a random chance to get a shroom instead of the wart.
Yeah, probably the more elegant solution to this! I'll revert the changes.
